keyword: how many calories in tomatoes cherry
title: How Many Calories in Cherry Tomatoes?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in tomatoes cherry (per 100g), including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition facts for easy meal planning.
h1: How Many Calories in Cherry Tomatoes?
assumptions: Fresh, raw cherry tomatoes; average size (~17g each), no added salt or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of cherry tomatoes provide about 18 kcal and are rich in vitamins with minimal fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil dressing per 100 g
Sun-dried cherry tomatoes (vs. fresh) per 100 g
Roasted with herbs (minimal oil) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g cherry tomatoes?
faqs.a: About 18 kcal per 100g of fresh cherry tomatoes.
Yes, around 3.9g carbs per 100g, with 1.2g fiber.

faqs.q: How much protein in cherry tomatoes?
faqs.a: Only 0.9g protein per 100g; they're mostly water and vitamins.
Very low at 0.2g total fat per 100g, with 0g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Calories in a cup of cherry tomatoes?
faqs.a: About 27 kcal for 1 cup (~149g); scale from 18 kcal per 100g.
